quote: It was around then that the phone rang. It was my friend Cee Cee, wanting to know if I cared to join her and Adam McTavish at the Coffee Clutch to drink iced tea and talk bad about everyone we know.
quote_letters: IT WAS AROUND THEN THAT THE PHONE RANG IT WAS MY FRIEND CEE CEE WANTING TO KNOW IF I CARED TO JOIN HER AND ADAM MCTAVISH AT THE COFFEE CLUTCH TO DRINK ICED TEA AND TALK BAD ABOUT EVERYONE WE KNOW
